name: Match 3 Saga
description:
Welcome to the Match 3 Saga!
Match 3 Saga is a delicious and amazing new match-3 puzzle game filled with hundreds of tasty fruit-goodies levels and candy-like treats that are sure to satisfy your craving for fun!

Adding your world into the game is so easy!
If you wish to add your imagine world to this game, just describe it in review, and you have a great chance to get new challenges for you, Kattie and cat Rufus in your world in nearest game updates!

Sweet crush game!
It’s time to get matching fruits and spreading the jelly!
Our awesome matching game is super fun and easy to learn. Make lines of 3 or more yummy fruit to blast and clear the board. Crush and smash your way around tricky challenges, solve the puzzles and enjoy the classic and most addicting gameplay. Bomb your way out of tricky challenges as you play this amazing fruit game as much as you want. And as a result watch the magic happen, use your moves wisely and you’ll be sure to solve the puzzles.

Amazing challenges!
Form a strategy to crush your way through the levels, match items and create combos. Swap the delicious fruit items, and make sure to plan ahead and save your boosts until you need them! Take yourself on a wild journey and experience the match3 adventure with fruit mania in kingdoms of orange, lemon, kiwi and other delicious fruits. There are splendid Fruits that need matching and marvellous boosters designed to help you overcome the trickier puzzles of this adventure! Danger and hardship await you on your adventure, but you are sure to best any puzzle without trouble!

Your assistants in the game will be a wonderful and cheerful girl Kattie and cat Rufus, who will help you to beat all the games with ease.

Excellent action waits for kids and adults alike. Boys and girls, you will have unlimited fun playing this jewel of a game!

Puzzle game with tricky levels will steal your free time. Use your skills, logic and imagination to become a match-3 master.

Match 3 Saga features:
- Swap, match and crush fruits in hundreds of fun and challenging match-3 puzzle levels;
- Relaxing match-3 gameplay;
- Unwrap delicious environments and meet the sweetest characters;
- It's easy to get various bonuses from the fruits spin wheel. Those are a great help in difficult levels!! Remember to sign in everyday to get them!
- A great soundtrack and juicy sound effects;
- A joyful gameplay that you can enjoy with mysterious and colorful graphics;
- No Wi-Fi, no problem! Play any time with or without an internet connection;
- Supporting 14 languages!

What can we bring to you?
- To spend the juiciest and fruitiest time!
- To play in various worlds and to pass amazing challenges.
- Train your brain and your fingers.
- So that you and your friends are more closely.

Match 3 Saga is completely free to play, in-game currency is available to purchase items such as extra moves or lives which will require payment with real money.

If you or your family is a fan of fruits puzzle games then sweet fruit candy is suitable for you.
I believe you will love it!
What are you waiting for? DOWNLOAD FREE it now and PLAY with you friends!
Enjoy this delicious and addictive puzzle sweet game!

Match 3 Saga will be updated regularly. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
